text: Aroha is a Māori word meaning "love", cognate with the Hawaiian term aloha. In one genre of music by the name of kpop (Korean pop) Aroha is the name of fandom of Astro kpop group.' It is also a given name. Notable people with the name include: * Aroha Awarau, journalist and playwright from New Zealand * Aroha Reriti-Crofts, former national president of the Māori Women's Welfare League * Te Aroha Keenan, New Zealand former netball coach * Aroha Savage (born 1990), rugby union player from New Zealand *Neve Te Aroha Ardern Gayford (born 2018), daughter of New Zealand Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern == Fictional characters == * Aroha Reed, character in the TVNZ soap opera Shortland Street == See also == * Te Aroha, a town in the North Island of New Zealand ==References==
title: Aroha
